title: Need 1 person to join ranked team games
body:
Hey I need 1 person to join for ranked games pretty much all of saturday and most likely tomorrow night too.
Top laner preferred.

replies.body:
I'm a Top Laner only/main. I can play Irelia, Maokai, Fizz, Gnar, Shen, Malphite Top.
I'm currently Plat 3 with a peak of P2 and have been playing since Season 3.
I would like to work in a team and improve on my communication/ranked 5's strategies.

Cheers,

IGN: xSwaggyMcYolo
Profile: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=xswaggymcyolo
Hey mate will add tomorrow, got a couple other guys keen but if they don't work out you're cool to fill the spot

I am a main top laner, I play Pantheon mainly as top... I haven't played many ranked games so am still unranked, I've only been level 30 for a few weeks, just trying to build up a vast majority of rune pages for every area before hitting ranked... But would be more than glad to give you a session to see what I can do :)
Team average is probs gold IV
